content: the stunning indigo shrug by tatsiana kupryanchyk is made in scheepjes whirl and whirlette this design is one of many designs published by scheepjes yarns in their yarn - the after party booklets released with a new design every 2 weeks also available in print form scheepjes stockists **yarn requirements** * scheepjes whirl 60% cotton 40% acrylic 215-225g/1000m colour 755 blueberry bambam x 1 yarn cake * scheepjes whirlette 60% cottn 40% acrylic 100g/455m colour 860 ice x 1 ball **tip regarding sizing** the pattern is one size only as per measurements above however the garment can be easily made to a larger size by simply continuing the pattern if you choose to increase the garment size in this way you may require an additional whirlette ball this crochet pattern is suitable for beginners and contains a written pattern the pattern is available as a digital download in dutch german swedish french and english uk and us terms the pattern is also available as a hardcopy booklet in dutch and english available from scheepjes retailers scheepjes has full copyright for this pattern for pattern support please email design@debondtbv nl
